frame.name: Temporary_stay
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Guest</fen> stays for a time at a <fen>Location</fen>, which is not his or her permanent residence, for some <fen>Duration</fen>. The <fen>Location</fen> is often the permanent residence of a <fen>Host</fen>.
<ex><fex name="pro">I</fex> usually <t>stay</t> <fex name="Host">with my aunt</fex> <fex name="loc">at her summer house</fex> <fex name="Time">when I go to Seville</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="dur">For a few days</fex> <fex name="pro">my father</fex> <t>lodged</t> <fex name="loc">at a hotel</fex> <fex name="cor">with a buddy who was a biology student</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Guest
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Guest</fen> remains for a relatively short period of time in the <fen>Location</fen>.
<ex>Originally, <fex name="pro">we</fex> planned on <t>rooming</t> with our relatives in Reno.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Location
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Location</fen> where the <fen>Guest</fen> spends a short amount of time.
<ex>Originally <fex name="pro">we</fex> planned on <t>staying</t> <fex name="loc">at the Hilton</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition:
<def-root>The length of time that the <fen>Guest</fen> remains at the <fen>Location</fen>.
<ex>My wife and have just returned from a <fex name="dur">two day</fex> <t>stay</t> at Ocean Key.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Co-participant
FE.definition:
<def-root>Another person who, along with the <fen>Guest</fen>, is temporarily living at the <fen>Location</fen>.
<ex>I will <t>stay</t> at my parents' home, <fex name="Co-participant">along with my wife and cats</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time at which the temporary stay takes place.
<ex>He'll be <t>lodging</t> here <fex name="tim">next month</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Host
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Host</fen> is living at the <fen>Location</fen> on a permanent basis, and is allowing the <fen>Guest</fen> to stay there.
<ex>You should avoid <t>staying</t> <fex name="res">with old college buddies</fex> when on business trips.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The activity that the <fen>Guest</fen> hopes to achieve by the stay.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>An action of the <fen>Guest</fen> that brings about their ability to stay at the <fen>Location</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the type of event by comparison to other events (<ment>the same way</ment>) or by characterizing a state of the <fen>Guest</fen> that affects the action.</def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition: <def-root>The average number of times the event occurs over a period.</def-root>

FE.name: Iterations
FE.definition: <def-root>The number of times that the event occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition:
<def-root>A description of one of the participants in the temporary stay, or of the staying state-of-affairs in general.
<ex>I hope you have a <fex name="des">pleasant</fex> <t>stay</t> at our lodge.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> indicates the larger physical setting of the temporary stay.
<ex><fex name="pla">In London</fex>, I <t>stayed</t> at a hotel.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>A state of affairs that provides an explanation for the temporary stay.</def-root>

FE.name: Containing_event
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE denotes an event that occurs or state of affairs that holds at a time that includes the time of the temporary stay, and which is taken to be a part of the stay.</def-root>
